AUTHENTICATE-UNEXPECTED-OR-MISSING-KEYS.title: Authentication Failed
AUTHENTICATE-UNEXPECTED-OR-MISSING-KEYS.detail: An attempt to authenticate was made, but the provided data is invalid.

meta.explanation: This error is reported when an attempt to authenticate was made with an invalid payload.

INVALID-TOKEN-FOR-RESTORE.title: Authentication Failed
INVALID-TOKEN-FOR-RESTORE.detail: An attempt to restore a session was made, but failed because the authentication token is invalid.

meta.explanation: This error is reported when an attempt to restore a previously authenticated session was made, but a valid auth token was not provided as either a header or a cookie.

ROLE-NOT-ALLOWED-FOR-RESTORE.title: Authentication Failed
ROLE-NOT-ALLOWED-FOR-RESTORE.detail: An attempt to restore a session was made, but failed because this account is not permitted to access this endpoint.

meta.explanation: This error is reported when an attempt to restore a previously authenticated session was made by a user that is not a member of the allowed roles permitted to authenticate at this endpoint.

ROLE-NOT-ALLOWED-FOR-CLOSE.title: Session Close Failed
ROLE-NOT-ALLOWED-FOR-CLOSE.detail: An attempt to close a session was made, but failed because this account is not permitted to access this endpoint.

meta.explanation: This error is reported when an attempt to close a previously authenticated session was made by a user that is not a member of the allowed roles permitted to authenticate at this endpoint.

ROLE-NOT-ALLOWED-FOR-AUTHENTICATION.title: Authentication Failed
ROLE-NOT-ALLOWED-FOR-AUTHENTICATION.detail: An attempt to authenticate was made, but this account has insufficent access to use this application.

meta.explanation: This error is reported when an attempt to authenticate has succeeded, but the user account is not a member of any of the roles permitted to authenticate.

INVALID-CREDENTIALS.title: Authentication Failed
INVALID-CREDENTIALS.detail: An attempt to authenticate was made, but the provided credentials are not valid.

meta.explanation: This error is reported when an attempt to authenticate was, but either the username or password are incorrect.

ACCOUNT-DISABLED.title: Authentication Failed
ACCOUNT-DISABLED.detail: An attempt to authenticate was made, but the account is disabled.

meta.explanation: This error is reported when an attempt to authenticate was, but either the account is set as disabled.

ACCOUNT-NOT-ACTIVATED.title: Authentication Failed
ACCOUNT-NOT-ACTIVATED.detail: An attempt to authenticate was made, but the account is not currently activated.

meta.explanation: This error is reported when an attempt to authenticate was, but either the account has not yet been activated.

ACCOUNT-STATE-UNKNOWN.title: Authentication Failed
ACCOUNT-STATE-UNKNOWN.detail: An attempt to authenticate was made, but the account state is not known.

meta.explanation: This error is reported when an attempt to authenticate was, but the authenticator does not understand the account state value.

FAILED-TO-RETRIEVE-ACCOUNT-RECORD.title: Authentication Failed
FAILED-TO-RETRIEVE-ACCOUNT-RECORD.detail: An attempt to authenticate was successful, but the account could not be retrieved.

meta.explanation: This error is reported after a successful authentication was made, but the attempt to fetch the user document produced a database error.
